text: Thanks Mitch. I can't see why that would make them void my bets though as my bot only places bets if the market is actually inplay. I can understand them voiding bets placed while market was not inplay but the race was. I'll not waste energy on it though even if its ended up an expensive mistake on their part (from my POV).
